name: Solar System Simulator (Max4077)
description:
Here's my Solar System project! I added the following elements:

  • Mercury
  • Mars
  • Saturn (and its moon Titan)
  • Pluto
  • Black Hole
  • Black Hole sound
  • Black Hole icon

Instructions for the Black Hole Easter egg: Click on Pluto when it comes into view (it has the same rotation speed as Earth). Pluto will orbit behind the camera, causing the Black Hole object to come into view. The Black Hole can be clicked on like the other planets.

Credits:

  • Created by Max
  • Black hole sound effect from nemaavla on Pixabay
